TopicTitle: The strange and the beautiful...one video

Articles.Content: I think its been done, but man is it fun! Also, thanks KerbPaint. The second plane is so sexaaay, LOL

Dude! you just built a Focke-Wulf Treibflugel! Way to Go!

info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Focke-Wulf_Triebfl%C3%BCgel

the second one reminds me of an SU-47 Berkut

info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sukhoi_Su-47

stick some radial intakes on it and you and you might get some more speed out of it.

Edited September 15, 2014 by dacamp66

HA! You hit the nail on the head sir! I didn't want to reference it at first since I didn't want people looking and saying I made a Axis based craft. But YES, this is what the craft is based off of, the Focke-Wulf TriebflÃƒÂ¼gel.

Good eyes!
